mapper.select: select user_nick, user_id, user_name, tel, email, date_format(register_date,'%Y.%m.%d') as register_date, permission, want, career_year, career from user
select count(user_id) from user where permission = "user"
select count(user_id) from user where permission = "mentor"
select count(user_id) from user where permission="admin"
select board.title,board.user_id as writer,report.user_id,report.report_content,report.report_time,report.report_type_num from report INNER JOIN board ON report.board_num = board.board_num
